You don‚Äôt have to wait, though ‚Äì Newegg already has a pre‚ÄìBlack Friday event live right now, complete with price protection, so you can shop early without worry. items.title: Death toll in Ecuador bus crash climbs to 21, 40 injured
items.summary: The death toll of a bus crash in Simiatug, in central Ecuador, on Sunday has risen to 21 people and at least 40 injured, the country's emergency services said on Monday.¬†The bus was driving along an inter-provincial route between the cities of Simiatug and Ambato when it lost control and tumbled down 150 meters, the emergency services said in a statement.¬†Ecuador's disaster agency had initially reported 12 dead and at least 10 injured on Sunday. Read full story
